import React, { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' import MetaData from './layouts/MetaData' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { getProducts } from '../actions/productActions' const Home = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { loading, products, error, productsCount } = useSelector(state => state.products) useEffect(() => { dispatch(getProducts()) }, [dispatch]) return (

Ultimos Produtos

{products && products.map(product => (
{product.name}
(5 Reviews)

$45.67

View Details
))}
) } export default Home
